name: Middle Eastern Rice with Black Beans and Chickpeas
author: JULIEP
summary: I got this recipe from a friend who is from Bethlehem. The flavors are just delicious. The possibilities of add-ins are endless.
ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans garbanzo beans (chickpeas), drained and rinsed
2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, drained and rinsed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat
Stir in garlic, and cook 1 minute
Stir in rice, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and cayenne pepper
Cook and stir 5 minutes, then pour in chicken stock
Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer 20 minutes
Place the turkey in a skillet over medium heat, and cook until evenly brown
Gently mix cooked turkey, garbanzo beans, black beans, cilantro, parsley, and pine nuts into the cooked rice
